document.description: Please be aware that your PayPal receipt will say “adWhite promotions.” ... Wear a stylish black beanie to keep your head warm and make a statement - $12.50/ea!
document.body:
HOME | ABOUT | LOCATIONS | MENU Over 170 Locations! FRANCHISING | MERCHANDISE | CONTACT Welcome to the only place where you can purchase Chicken Express branded merchandise on the Web.
We proudly sell high-quality apparel and merchandise with the Chicken Express logo to Chicken Express customers across the country. We currently are offering multiple t-shirt and headwear options that all bear the Chicken Express logo. We’ll add new items every once in a while, so please check back periodically for new items.
Items may take 2-3 weeks to arrive, but most of the time they are available and in your hands in less than 2 weeks. Please be aware that your PayPal receipt will say“adWhite promotions.”
Two-Toned Cap This two-toned cap is washed for comfort and has a mesh back for exceptional breathability. Includes a Chicken Express logo on the front. $15/ea
Black Beanie Wear a stylish black beanie to keep your head warm and make a statement - $12.50/ea!
Login ©2011 Chicken Express | Web site design and hosting by adWhite
